internal.content: --- title: "Report" --- report-toolkit API @report-toolkit/common report Report Represents a [Diagnostic Report](https://nodejs.org/api/process.html#process_process_report_getreport_err). **`todo`** Need to create a JSON schema or typedef for raw Report object ## Hierarchy * **Report** ## Constructors ### constructor \+ **new Report**(`report`: any, `filepath?`: string): *[Report](report_toolkit_common.report.report)* Asserts `report` is a [ReportLike](../modules/report_toolkit_common.report.mdx#reportlike) value. Removes any unknown properties. Assigns internally-used `Symbol`s. **Parameters:** Name | Type | Description | ------ | ------ | ------ | `report` | any | Raw object | `filepath?` | string | Original filepath of report, if available. Defaults to [NO_FILEPATH](../modules/report_toolkit_common.constants.mdx#const-no_filepath) | **Returns:** *[Report](report_toolkit_common.report.report)* ## Properties ### __computed • **__computed**: *boolean* ## Accessors ### filepath • **get filepath**(): *string* Original filepath of report, if available. Defaults to [NO_FILEPATH](../modules/report_toolkit_common.constants.mdx#const-no_filepath). **Returns:** *string* ## Methods ### `Static` create ▸ **create**(`rawReport`: any, `filepath`: string): *Readonly‹[Report](report_toolkit_common.report.report)›* Creates a read-only [Report](report_toolkit_common.report.report.mdx) from a [ReportLike](../modules/report_toolkit_common.report.mdx#reportlike) value. Use this instead of `new Report()`! **Parameters:** Name | Type | Description | ------ | ------ | ------ | `rawReport` | any | - | `filepath` | string | | **Returns:** *Readonly‹[Report](report_toolkit_common.report.report)›* ___ ### `Static` isReport ▸ **isReport**(`value`: any): *boolean* Returns `true` if the value is an object having a property `report-toolkit-report` `Symbol` with value `true`. **Parameters:** Name | Type | Description | ------ | ------ | ------ | `value` | any | | **Returns:** *boolean* ___ ### `Static` isReportLike ▸ **isReportLike**(`value`: any): *boolean* Returns `true` if `value` has all expected root properties of a Diagnostic Report (as returned by [process.report.getReport()](https://nodejs.org/api/process.html#process_process_report_getreport_err)), or is a [Report](report_toolkit_common.report.report.mdx). **Parameters:** Name | Type | Description | ------ | ------ | ------ | `value` | any | | **Returns:** *boolean*

Removes any unknown properties. Assigns internally-used `Symbol`s. **Parameters:** Name | Type | Description | ------ | ------ | ------ | `report` | any | Raw object | `filepath?` | string | Original filepath of report, if available. Defaults to [NO_FILEPATH](../modules/report_toolkit_common.constants.mdx#const-no_filepath) | **Returns:** *[Report](report_toolkit_common.report.report)* ## Properties ### __computed • **__computed**: *boolean* ## Accessors ### filepath • **get filepath**(): *string* Original filepath of report, if available. Defaults to [NO_FILEPATH](../modules/report_toolkit_common.constants.mdx#const-no_filepath). **Returns:** *string* ## Methods ### `Static` create ▸ **create**(`rawReport`: any, `filepath`: string): *Readonly‹[Report](report_toolkit_common.report.report)›* Creates a read-only [Report](report_toolkit_common.report.report.mdx) from a [ReportLike](../modules/report_toolkit_common.report.mdx#reportlike) value. Use this instead of `new Report()`! **Parameters:** Name | Type | Description | ------ | ------ | ------ | `rawReport` | any | - | `filepath` | string | | **Returns:** *Readonly‹[Report](report_toolkit_common.report.report)›* ___ ### `Static` isReport ▸ **isReport**(`value`: any): *boolean* Returns `true` if the value is an object having a property `report-toolkit-report` `Symbol` with value `true`. **Parameters:** Name | Type | Description | ------ | ------ | ------ | `value` | any | | **Returns:** *boolean* ___ ### `Static` isReportLike ▸ **isReportLike**(`value`: any): *boolean* Returns `true` if `value` has all expected root properties of a Diagnostic Report (as returned by [process.report.getReport()](https://nodejs.org/api/process.html#process_process_report_getreport_err)), or is a [Report](report_toolkit_common.report.report.mdx). **Parameters:** Name | Type | Description | ------ | ------ | ------ | `value` | any | | **Returns:** *boolean*
